objects.text: • 100Hz REFRESH RATE • 1MS VRB • AMD FREE SYNC

product_details.name: Acer EK220Q Ebi 21.5 Inch IPS Full HD (1920x1080) Backlit LED LCD Monitor I 1 MS VRB, 100Hz Refresh I 250 Nits I 99% SRGB I HDMI & VGA Ports with HDMI Cable I AMD Free Sync I Eye Care Features (Black)
product_details.description: Brand: acer. Series: EK220Q E3. Colour: Black. Item Height: 18.11 Centimeters. Item Width: 50.29 Centimeters. Standing screen display size: 21.5 Inches. Screen Resolution: 1920 x 1080. Resolution: 1920 x 1080 Pixels. Product Dimensions: 37.9 x 50.29 x 18.11 cm; 2.8 kg. Number of HDMI Ports: 1. Voltage: 240 Volts. Country of Origin: China. Item Weight: 2 kg 800 g. Importer: ACER INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED Embassy Heights, 6th Floor, No. 13 Magrath Road, Next to HOSMAT Hospital, Bangalore, INDIA – 560025. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 37.9 x 50.3 x 18.1 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Piece. Generic Name: Monitor.

banner_details:
The banner features a futuristic digital aesthetic with a dark purple radial gradient background enhanced by scattered bright cyan dots that create a starry effect. At the top, a bold heading (`heading`) stands out in white, followed by a vibrant subheading (`subheading`) below it in a glowing cyan. The center showcases a monitor image (`product_image`) encircled by a stylized dotted ellipse for emphasis. To the side, a bright magenta circular badge holds the price (`price`). Below the product, the model name (`product_name`) and key features (`features`) are listed in white and cyan text respectively. A rectangular cyan button (`cta_button_bg`) with navy text (`cta`) calls to action.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Purple: #0A0633
- Gradient Purple: #2A1E66 to #120A40
- Bright Cyan: #00FFFF
- White: #FFFFFF
- Magenta Pink: #FF00AA
- Button Blue: #00FFFF
- Button Text: #0A0633
product_color: The product image showcases an Acer monitor with a vibrant, futuristic cityscape as the display content. The dominant color palette includes electric purples (#8000FF), neon blues (#00FFFF), hot pinks (#FF00C8), and deep midnight blues (#0B0033) blended into a twilight nightscape. These colors are seamlessly graded to create a sense of depth and motion, using high-contrast neon tones to highlight key product features (e.g., "100Hz", "Full HD", "IPS", etc.). Bright color accents emphasize display quality and speed, while white (#FFFFFF) fonts stand out against the dark background. This visually energetic palette is perfect for ad banners targeting a tech-savvy, gaming-centric audience.
